cab.content: This Document is thBritannic Mais^y'-Toperty oi i-jvernmerrMilitary Secret1080From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of Slate for India,Sth September 1919.(Received 9th.)Priority A.12243. -6th September. -Malleson wires Gth September : " Refugee Turkman(s) on frontiers having disposed of practically all their, belongings to buy food are now selling their rifles, many of which were given by us. These are finding their way to Herat and Afghan Frontier, where apparently, renewed demand for arms has set in."
